mapper.select: select ui.id , ui.user_id , ui.user_name , ui.password , ui.user_uuid , ui.mobile_number , ui.birth , ui.zipcode , ui.address , ui.address_detail , ur.role_id , r.role_code from user_info ui inner join user_roles ur on ur.user_id = ui.user_id inner join roles r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where 1 = 1 and ui.user_id = #{userId};
select user_id , password from user_info where 1 = 1 and user_id = #{userId};
